encyclopedia.content: 韩剧《stand by》基本信息 主演 柳镇、金秀贤 林时完、郑素敏、夏石镇、李基宇 郑基石 （SimonD） 等。 导演 前下水 首播时间 2012年4月9日 播出时间 每周一至周五各播放1集 类型 情景日日剧 接档 《highkick3》 集数 120集（暂定） 放松 韩国MBC电视台剧情简介 讲述以广播局为背景的搞笑故事，剧中，柳镇扮演胆小谨慎的电视台主播，善良的傻大叔柳镇行，与金秀炫等女人展开lovelin，而林时完则扮演柳镇收养的儿子，完美高中生，

entry.def: A standby is something or someone that is always ready to be used if they are needed.

example.ex: Canned varieties of beans and pulses are a good standby...
example.tran: 各种豆类罐头制品是很好的常备食品。

example.ex: He sat through the trial as a standby juror.
example.tran: 他作为候补陪审员参加了审判的全过程。

entry.def: If someone or something is on standby, they are ready to be used if they are needed.

example.ex: Five ambulances are on standby at the port...
Security forces have been put on standby in case of violence.
example.tran: 安全部队已处于待命状态，以防出现暴力事件。

entry.tran: (戏票或机票)最后时刻廉价出售的，剩余的
entry.def: A standby ticket for something such as the theatre or a plane journey is a cheap ticket that you buy just before the performance starts or the plane takes off, if there are still some seats left.

example.ex: Access International books standby flights from New York to Europe.
example.tran: 全球通达公司可以预订从纽约到欧洲的剩余机票。

means.word_mean: 1. something that can be relied on when needed
2. an actor able to replace a regular performer when required

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, Chris Evans is on standby.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, Chris Evans is on standby.

sentences.en: Keep some candles as a standby in case the power fails.
sentences.cn: 预备一些蜡烛以防断电。

sentences.en: Two divers work together while a standby diver remains on the surface.
sentences.cn: 两名潜水员协同工作,同时有一名候补潜水员留在水面上。

means.word_mean: 随时准备行动；处于待命状态

sentences.en: The emergency services were put on standby after a bomb warning.
sentences.cn: 接到炸弹警报后，各紧急救助部门进入待命状态。

sentences.en: He was on standby for the flight to New York.
sentences.cn: 他在等退票或余票，一旦有票便乘飞机前往纽约。
